txt.en:
The Dead have overrun Sarch Vorn.

You should journey deeper into Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>
Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave -- Solo/Duo
'Been to the Black Grave? Are you looking to improve your jewellery?'

You have encountered Fladach, a terrible creature that bars the path deeper into Sarch Vorn.

You should defeat Fladach.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>

You have defeated Fladach and cleared the path deeper into Sarch Vorn.

You should continue deeper into Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>
All around the chamber, urns emerge from the earth...
Use the summoning horn to call RANGER WOMAN TBD
TBD
'Freedom... finally...'
Explore Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear
'You are brave, to have made it this far.'
'But Sarch Vorn will not be a part of your story. It will be the end.'
You have defeated Luilloth
Defeat Fladach
Continue deeper into Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear
You have defeated Hithrengor, the Grey Fear
With a din of splintering bones and branches, a terrible creature awakens!

You have encountered Luilloth in the depths of Sarch Vorn.

You should defeat Luilloth and free her remains of the fell spirit that now inhabits them.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>
In the darkest depths of Sarch Vorn, you discover Hithrengor in the guise of Prince Amondir!
Defeat Luilloth

You have defeated Luilloth in the depths of Sarch Vorn.

You should continue onward to the deepest chambers of Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>

You have encountered Hithrengor, the Grey Fear in the deepest chamber of Sarch Vorn.

You should defeat Hithrengor, the Grey Fear, and banish his spirit from the wight of Prince Amondir.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Gorwen' skill to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.</rgb>
You have arrived at Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave.\n\nYou should collect the summoning horn. It will allow you to call Gorwen to your side at Sarch Vorn.
'Die! Die! Die!'
Descend into the deepest chambers of Sarch Vorn and search for Hithrengor, the Grey Fear
Collect the summoning horn and call Gorwen to your side
TBD\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If you need assistance, use the Call RANGER WOMAN TBD skill to call RANGER WOMAN TBD to your side.</rgb>
TBD
Defeat Hithrengor, the Grey Fear
TBD

Unbeknownst to the Men of Cardolan, Sarch Vorn, an ancient temple of the Edain, has long served as the resting place of a malevolent spirit of the Elder Days known only as Hithrengor, the Grey Fear. Roused by the return of the Witch-king of Angmar, the Grey Fear has awoken from its slumber to once again spread terror and death across the ravaged lands of Cardolan.
You have defeated Fladach
The remains of Luilloth have been animated by a fell spirit!
